testsuite.name: dev.idachev.recipeservice.web.GlobalExceptionHandlerApiTest

testcase.name: Given invalid UUID format, when getting recipe by ID, then return 400 bad request for MethodArgumentTypeMismatchException
Given bad request exception, when processing request, then return 400 bad request
Given runtime exception, when processing request, then return 500 internal server error
Given non-existent recipe ID, when getting recipe, then return 404 not found error
Given missing required parameter, when searching recipes, then return 400 bad request
Given unauthorized exception, when accessing protected resource, then return 401 unauthorized
Given malformed JSON, when creating recipe, then return 400 bad request for HttpMessageNotReadableException
Given invalid request data, when creating recipe, then return 400 bad request with validation errors
